Lead and Opportunity Management: CR Lead and Opportunity Procedure Instance Record
CR Lead and Opportunity Procedure Instance Record
column4: Reference to the associated customer (can currently be a person or a company)

Lead and Opportunity Management: CR Lead and Opportunity Procedure Instance Record
column4: Reference to the customer campaign generating the lead (if the opportunity is generated by a campaign)

Lead and Opportunity Management: CR Lead and Opportunity Procedure Instance Record
column4: The type of campaign (e.g. cross-sell, up-sell, retention)

Lead and Opportunity Management: CR Lead and Opportunity Procedure Instance Record
column4: The version number of the campaign (used to track campaign impact)

Lead and Opportunity Management: CR Lead and Opportunity Procedure Instance Record
column4: The type of product or service identified in the lead/opportunity

Lead and Opportunity Management: CR Lead and Opportunity Procedure Instance Record
column4: Reference to a specific product instance if the lead is an up-sell to an existing product agreement

Lead and Opportunity Management: CR Lead and Opportunity Procedure Instance Record
column4: Employees involved in capturing the lead/opportunity

Lead and Opportunity Management: CR Lead and Opportunity Procedure Instance Record
column4: Narrative/description of the opportunity if available

Lead and Opportunity Management: CR Lead and Opportunity Procedure Instance Record
column4: Date and time and the location the lead/opportunity was captured
Employees involved in progressing the lead/opportunity
Reference to a contact event log
Reference to the correspondence generated and received
Correspondence content - messages sent to and received from involved parties
The document reference for associated documents
Document copy/content - legal or significant documents created & referenced
Work documentation, forms and schedules produced and referenced during the lead development
The outcome of the lead development workstep
Date and time and the location the lead/opportunity was developed
